Reviews.Content: excellent multilingual staff amazing spanish buffet breakfast skip scrambled options nice wireless computers lobby printer broken happy help print staff printer downstairs spa lukewarm pool various water features wonder supposed hot tub location foot montjuic funicular parallel metro stop easily able walk foot ramblas columbus monument bus subway else hotel hard prove themselves tough market deal 3 days living social super reasonable definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, small & cosy”
Reviews.Author: Lynn V Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: spent 1 night hotel absolutely loved nicely decorated spacious terrace hotel located 10 minutes walk ramblas via parallel lot nice little restaurants spa cosy staff friendly helpful trip barcelona stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel to explore Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: jeremy a
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect explore barcelona clean kettle poolspa nice expected breakfast reasonable probably worth extra included walk la rambla 10 minutes ideal night takes strange found staff helpful polite dont plan meal night hotel below average overall enjoyed stay definitely return

Reviews.Content: location clean public friendly staff quiet hotel travelled partner week bad word hotel excellent location near marina access metro allowed check due flight times hotel accommodating wait late flight barcelona visit barcelona hotel returning

Reviews.Title: “da EVITARE !!!!”
Reviews.Author: FrancescoA3
Reviews.Content: arrived afternoon saturday management told available pipe burst flooded entire floor available hotels day sunday available repaired saturdays sundays yes mistake day free spa booked hotel sending foot barcelona service day returned random floor told fifth ok spa thats free toilet paper hours rose paper fortunately suffering diarrhea towards girl told rude booked via bookingcom return italy discovered knowledge hotel booking canceled reservation receive negative judgment poor living treatment received except location 4 star hotel consider stars cosmetic recommend

Reviews.Content: family friends spent days santa barcelona booked hotel via bookingcom choice nice modern furnished rich buffet breakfast day strolling barcelona streets position hotel near ramblas port hill background spectacular panoramic view

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the money”

Reviews.Content: located block mont juic 10 mins walk la rambla harbour location compared barcelona hotels reasonable price wifi included breakfast buffet bought recommend bakery door buy breakfast 13 price decent sized spa clean nice interior design friendly staff pillows beds tend sore neck easily bring own

Reviews.Title: “Really nice place, good value.”

Reviews.Content: friend stayed couple weeks ago thoroughly enjoyed grabbed cheap deal lastminutecom twin clean tidy access spa buffet breakfast everyday free welcome drink accompanied cheese cured ham stay recommend central short walk midst

Reviews.Content: husband son stayed hotel weekend break barcelona whilst taking barca football booked travel zoo competitive rate position hotel close lots bars eating placesthe beach 20 minute walk metro stations las ramblas hotel spotlessthe decor contemporary expectthe stayed spacious flat screen tv en suite shower roomthe beds comfy hotel spa excellent standard staff helpful friendly time visitors looking base include visit nou camp 5 stops green line nearest metro hotel 2 streets breakfast included definitely continental style adequate everyones cup tea conclude hotel recommended

Reviews.Title: “Hotel & rooms perfect, great location, just don´t wait for the barman”
